# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/signals`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for JS-Signals (http://millermedeiros.github.io/js-signals/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/signals.

### Additional Details
 * Last updated: Mon, 25 Sep 2023 13:39:06 GMT
 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: `signals`
